name: code-challenge-5
description: - [ ]  Your Front End should have two inputs. One for the user's name, the other for the user's message. Additionally, there         should be a submit button, - [ ] When the submit button is clicked, you must send the name and message from the inputs to the server to be written to an       SQL Database - [ ]  Once the message has been successfully written to the database, display all messages on the DOM, - [ ]  If the application page is reloaded, all previous messages should appear.
